message: Take it or leave it, Bob.  I'm feeling generous.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to be too generous
This is my final offer.  I'm willing to compromise, but I won't be taken advantage of again.
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice. I'll try to get a better deal this time
Let's split it down the middle this time.  We both know the money will be worth less and less with each round.
